name: Life & Limb
description:
Welcome to Junktown! 

Where loser service bots like you end up when your hoooman owner has 'lost' you. (That's code for 'left you out to rust'). But fret not! Even though your a piece of scrap metal, there's still a chance for you to become whole again by participating in our Junktown Rusty Race Show: Life & Limb! Work your way through the obstacle course and (re)claim all sorts of parts from our lost and found collection of thingamabobs!

Team: Professional Idiots
Programmer: M.M.G.J. Cuper
3D Artist: G. van der Waal
2D Artist: D. G. Pinto
